import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" function CreateShots() { const fileRef = useRef(null); const [file, setFile] = useState(null) const handleFileUpload = (e) => { let file = e.target.files; let reader = new FileReader() reader.readAsBinaryString(file[0]) reader.onloadend = () => { console.log(reader.result) } // console.log(read) } return (
